title: Plate, ""Western Star"", mid-19th century
markings: printed on underside:classical urn, beehive, flowers and foliage atop base with "Western Star" printed across front; "WR" over floral swags printed beneath.
dimensions: 2.5 h. x 24 diameter cm (1 x 9 7/16 in. )
description: Scalloped-edge plate with blue transfer-printed decoration. Central abstract flower motif with elaborate decorative surround. Border of scrolling bands with geometric motifs, between which are alternating Japaness flower motifs and neoclassical-like motifs with large acanthus leaf.

tombstone.epitaph:
Plate, ""Western Star"", mid-19th century.
mid-19th century. Earthenware, transfer-printed decoration. Gift of Paul F. Walter. 2001-25-5.
